attributes.action: Remove radio host Michael Savage from the list of people 'Barred' from the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
U.S. talk show host Michael Savage is guilty of expressing opinions and thoughts.
He has never advocated violence in any way, and has roundly denounced those who practise it. 
And yet, he has now found himself on a list which includes skinheads, thugs and murderers.
If the U.K. still wishes to cling onto the notion that it is a 'free' country, Michael Savage's name needs to be removed from this strange list immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
